```{r Commit 2}
data %>%
  count(screen_name, sort = TRUE, name = "n") %>%
  dplyr::slice(1:25) %>%
  mutate(screen_name = fct_reorder(screen_name,n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(screen_name, n)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()
```
